items.title: Clifford The Big Red Dog
items.subTitle: As middle schooler Emily Elizabeth struggles to fit in at home and at school, she discovers a small red puppy who is destined to become her best friend from a magical animal rescuer.

items.title: The Irishman
items.subTitle: In the 1950s, truck driver Frank Sheeran gets involved with Russell Bufalino and his Pennsylvania crime family. As Sheeran climbs the ranks to become a top hit man, he also goes to work for Jimmy Hoffa -- a powerful Teamster tied to organized crime.

items.title: Don't Look Up
items.subTitle: Two astronomers go on a media tour to warn humankind of a planet-killing comet hurtling toward Earth. The response from a distracted world: Meh.

items.title: All Quiet On The Western Front
items.subTitle: When 17-year-old Paul joins the Western Front in World War I, his initial excitement is soon shattered by the grim reality of life in the trenches.

items.title: Breaking Bad
items.subTitle: Walter White, a one-time mild-mannered chemistry teacher whose transformation into a deadly criminal kicks into overdrive.

items.title: The Gray Man
items.subTitle: When a shadowy CIA agent uncovers damning agency secrets, he’s hunted across the globe by a sociopathic rogue operative who’s put a bounty on his head.

items.title: The Red Notice
items.subTitle: An FBI profiler pursuing the world's most wanted art thief becomes his reluctant partner in crime to catch an elusive crook who's always one step ahead.

items.title: The Adam Project
items.subTitle: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self on a mission to save the future.

items.title: JUNG_E
items.subTitle: In a post-apocalyptic near-future, a researcher at an AI lab leads the effort to end a civil war by cloning the brain of a heroic soldier — her mother.

items.title: The Sea Beast
items.subTitle: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters — and make history to boot.

items.title: Finding ‘Ohana
items.subTitle: On Oʻahu for the summer, two siblings from Brooklyn connect with their Hawaiian heritage — and their family — on a daring quest for long-lost treasure.
